website_summaries.verdict: These headphones have good audio quality, and the noise reduction feature remains stable over time.
pros: Each side of the headphones has two trumpets for excellent audio quality
Fits nicely in the ear, allowing you to wear them for long periods of time
Built-in microphone allows you to make hands-free voice calls
cons: Will not work with every Android smartphone model

customer_reviews.title: Over heating USB-C Jack
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is really great but I'm giving it a one star due to the fact that I plugged it into my htc u11 to test it out, only listening to music for about a minute, then out of no where when I go to unplug it I almost burnt my hand from the jack being extremely hot. This is a serious hazard for burning or even exploding so I don't believe anyone should buy, it may be a defect with the one I bought but that doesn't mean it can't happen to others so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Chiocca

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was average but the headphones kept falling out of my ears no matter what silicon I used on the buds. I never could get the mic to pick up any audio. The volume "slider" worked and the play/pause button worked. The entire build is very cheap and I doubt these headphones would last long.
customer_reviews.author: David Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with HTC u11
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these to replace the headphones that came with my HTC u11. I plugged them in turned on my music and nothing these things do not work with my phone. I will add that they do appear to be a quality item and they do fit nicely in my ear. But without being able to use them I have already set up the return.
customer_reviews.author: billelliott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,but not perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones according to build quality,but it's hard to stay in ears for a long time.it just fall off.its annoying
customer_reviews.author: Abin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The ear piece started coming apart after one days use. Cheap quality for a not so cheap price. I've had better headphones from the $9.99 JVCs at Walmart. Do yourself a favor and don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: faviola r gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Like them when I purchased them, but one of the earbuds fell apart before I had them for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This Earbuds headset has a clear sound and a new style, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: tian ming cai

customer_reviews.title: and feels pretty comfortable with my ears
customer_reviews.text: not every expensive, and feels pretty comfortable with my ears, so I think it's nice~
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: ... is very clear , also this style is very nice , i like it so
customer_reviews.text: the sound is very clear , also this style is very nice , i like it so much
customer_reviews.author: Liao.Tzu-Jung

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with BIG sound. Happy with these and would recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built, don't last long
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy ear piece built in two things plastic parts that snap together. Had to snap them back frequently until one of them dropped when I wasn't looking, rendering the buds useless. Sound was low and not particularly better than a regular set of cheap analog ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Leon

product_meta.title: USB C Earbuds Headphones，VIMVIP Dual Dynamic Drivers Hi-Fi Digital Type C Earphones in-Ear Headset for Pixel 2/2XL,HTC U11/U12+,LG V30,Moto Z2,Huawei Mate 10/10 Pro/P20,New MacBook (Gray)
product_meta.description:
Made of high-flexibility nipple-class silicone, created with 120°oblique in-ear wearing design, and built with dual dynamic drivers, this Type C Earphones In-Ear Headset not only has an event-grade, stylish appearance but also can better-isolated noise, enhance the superb sound and fittings naturally match your ear canals, let you have a better listen experience. br> 

High Quality
Adopted Hi-Fi digital chip guarantees clear and stable sound quality, Hi-Res up to 24bit/192KHz. Digital audio to deliver lossless sound by connecting digital signal, enables you enjoy clear and crisp music. 

Compatibility 
Suitable for type c smartphone and computers without 3.5mm headphone jack.

Samsung Galaxy Note 8,S8
Huawei Mate 10
Motorola Moto Z
Xiaomi
LG
Nexus 6P/5X
HTC
Nokia Lumia OnePlus
New Macbook
Google Chrome book
LeEco and more Type C devices. 

Button Function 
Answer calls – Press once
To reject a call – Long press
Play music – Press once
Pause music – Press once
On a music – Press three times
Next music – Press twice

Product Specification 
Style: In-Ear Function: Music Player, Volume Control, Song Switch, Call Working Temperature Range: -20℃~+60℃ Connectors: Type C
feature_bullets: 【Hi-Fi Type C Digital Headphone】: The USB Type C headphone built with Hi-Fi digital chip guarantees clear and stable sound quality, Hi-Res up to 24bit/192KHz, signal-noise ratio up to 100dB, and amplifier 3dB for high electric resistance. High quality sound listen in quiet anytime and anywhere.

【Dual Dynamic Drivers Earbuds】：There are four trumpets in this usb c earbuds, each side has two which enhance the superb sound with high definition and exclusive tuning technology triband clear, natural, unique sensing technology to suppress high-frequency glitches, give you an immersive music experience.

【120°Oblique In-Ear Wearing】：This usb c headphone is adopted 120°Oblique In-Ear Wearing design which is more comfortable to wear because it fittings naturally match your ear canals. Used this type c headphone with ergonomics and soft design, you can enjoy music cozily at ease!

【Calling & Volume Control】：Inside the audio cable of this type c earbuds headphone has built a microphone so you can hands-free calls on or go and easily adjust volume. Drive-by-wire stereo headphones bring you more convenience.

【What You Get】: VIMVIP Dual Dynamic Drivers Hi-Fi Digital Type C Earphones In-Ear Headset for Pixel 2/2XL, HTC U11/U12+, LG V30, Moto Z2, Samsung S8/S9/Note8, New Macbook-Calling, Noise Reduction, Volume Control, and our 12 months friendly warranty customer service for you.
